metadata.title: CVE-2024-12570 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.7 prior to 17.4.6, from 17.5 prior to 17.5.4, and from17.6 prior to 17.6.2. It may have been possible for an attacker with avictim's `CI_JOB_TOKEN` to obtain a GitLab session token belonging to thevictim.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
